com.spacetimecat.java.lang

Class Try

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spacetimecat.java.lang.Try

  • public final class Try
extends java.lang.Object

    Try-finally with proper handling of suppressed throwable.

    This slightly differs from the built-in try-finally construct. This may be wrong if an Error (especially an StackOverflowError or an OutOfMemoryError) is thrown when this tries to execute the finally-part.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Try(java.lang.Runnable tryPart)

    • Method Detail

      • andFinally

        public void andFinally(java.lang.Runnable finallyPart)

        Run the try-part, and then run the finally-part regardless of how the try-part returns.

        If both the try-part and the finally-part throws a throwable, then the try-part's throwable is the throwable that will be thrown, and the finally-part's throwable becomes a suppressed throwable of the try-part's throwable.

        Parameters:
        finallyPart - the thing to do regardless of how the try-part returns
